title: Reformations affected culture of Europe to 1700

content.question: Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Analyze the ways in which the Protestant Reformation and the Catholic Reformation affected the culture of Europe in the period 1500-1700.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Analyze the ways in which the Protestant Reformation and the Catholic Reformation affected the culture of Europe in the period 1500-1700.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
